sentences.en: Do you feel anxious when unforeseen incidents intrude on your day?
sentences.cn: 当意外事件干扰了你的生活时，你会感到焦虑吗？

sentences.en: For protection against unforeseen emergencies, you insure your house, your furnishings and your car.
sentences.cn: 为了防范不可预见的紧急情况，人们给房子、家具和汽车上保险。

sentences.en: Instead, she awoke from surgery with an unforeseen problem.
sentences.cn: 然而, 手术后她却出现了始料未及的问题.

sentences.en: It reminded him that unforeseen factors operate in the evolution of immortality.
sentences.cn: 这种情形,叫他想到,事物不朽不灭的演化,是有不能预知的因素操纵着的.

sentences.en: Philby was there to monitor any unforeseen developments on a daily basis.
sentences.cn: 菲尔比在那里每日不断地监视着那些预料不到的事态的发展.

sentences.en: Radiation may damage cells in a way that was previously unforeseen.
sentences.cn: 辐射可能以一种我们过去未能预见到的方式破坏细胞。

sentences.en: The process still can't be controlled, and may have unforeseen limitations.
sentences.cn: 可是这一过程仍旧无法被控制, 也可能有无法预料到的局限性.
有许多无法预料的问题.

sentences.en: They stood aghast at this unforeseen disaster.
sentences.cn: 他们被这意外的灾祸吓呆了.
这是未预见到的复杂情况.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, this year's show has been cancelled.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，由于一些意外情况，今年的演出被取消了。

sentences.en: Wasn't it true that sometimes the greatest misfortunes brought unforeseen rewards?
sentences.cn: 据说,有时最大的不幸会带来预料不到的报偿,这敢情是真的 吗 ?

sentences.en: When arranging our work, we should allow for unforeseen circumstances.
sentences.cn: 我们安排工作时要留有余地.

phrases.tran_cn: 预料不到的情况，无法预见的情况

trans.tran_cn: 未预见到的，无法预料的，意外的，偶然的
trans.tran_en: an unforeseen situation is one that you did not expect to happen
